issuetype.description: A problem which impairs or prevents the functions of the product.
issuetype.name: Bug

projectCategory.description: Titanium and related SDKs used in application development
projectCategory.name: Client

status.description: The issue is considered finished, the resolution is correct. Issues which are closed can be reopened.
status.name: Closed

fields.description:
{html}

In the RC1 build of the SDK, when a device has Safari restricted and the Titanium.Facebook.authorize() code is called the application crashes. The module should function the same as when a non multi-tasking device calls into the code.

{html}
fields.summary: Facebook Module in RC1 mobile - Safari restricted

comments.body: Closing ticket due to time passed and no progress for a number of years. Any problems, please file a new ticket.
